subject: Baseball
Sports Medicine
lead_paragraph: Nine players placed on the disabled list, including Jose Reyes, J. J. Putz, Billy Wagner and Carlos Delgado, have worked out in Port St. Lucie, trying to heal in time to make a difference.
snippet: Nine players placed on the disabled list, including Jose Reyes, J. J. Putz, Billy Wagner and Carlos Delgado, have worked out in Port St. Lucie, trying to heal in time to make a difference.
